message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.ITP. 

The paper deals with the computation of entropy rates and their derivatives in hidden Markov chains corrupted by noise. This topic is closely related to information theory (cs.IT) and machine learning (cs.LG), as well as to the study of discrete structures (cs.DS) and statistical inference (cs.SI). Additionally, the paper uses mathematical tools such as measure theory (cs.ITP), which further supports these categories.
